summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4355 for the improvement of Henderson Street, from 8th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51588, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
